duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and oversee inventory management systems and execute cycle count and reconciliation activities to ensure accuracy.
Optimize and efficiently utilize warehouse space, keeping in compliance with regulatory inspections and safety audits.
Manage freight forwarders and internal clients, and develop and train standard operating procedures and work instructions.
Ensure compliance to warehouse and logistics policies and procedures and maintain data integrity of inventory records.
Contribute to strategic initiatives and projects to enhance current processes, policies, and capabilities.
Provide guidance and training on policies and procedures for inventory, distribution, and system usage.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s degree in Logistics or related field (Bachelor's degree preferred)
